Class BasePanel

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.StackPane
it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUI.BasePanel

javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget

    • createBoardButton

      public javafx.scene.control.Button createBoardButton(ClientView clientView, double boardWidth, double boardHeight, int i, int j, boolean filled) throws IOException
      Parameters:
      clientView - : Client infos
      boardWidth - : Button width
      boardHeight - : Button height
      i - : Board row
      j - : Board column
      filled - : true if filled, false if empty
      Returns:
      : BoardButton with the correct tile image
      Throws:
      IOException

    • createCardsBox

      public javafx.scene.layout.VBox createCardsBox(ClientView clientView, javafx.geometry.Rectangle2D screenBounds) throws IOException
      Parameters:
      clientView - : Client infos
      screenBounds - : screen properties (width and height)
      Returns:
      Vbox containing buttons that shows personal goal card, common goal cards, your bookshelf and the possibility to restore the info from the Client view and to quit from the game
      Throws:
      IOException
